articles.author: STAN CHOE
articles.title: Stock market today: Asian shares climb as Canada, Mexico tariffs are postponed and China retaliates - The Associated Press
articles.description: Some calm is returning to Wall Street, and U.S. stock indexes are making only modest moves after much of Europe and Asia rose earlier in the day. The S&P 500 rose 0.1% in early trading Tuesday, a day after swinging sharply on worries that President Donald Tru…
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) Some calm is returning to Wall Street Tuesday, and U.S. stock indexes are making only modest moves in early trading after much of Europe and Asia rose earlier in the day.
